title: Understanding Bucket Pick Strategies
text:
Each day, Steam5 randomly selects a bucket pick strategy that determines which review count ranges the games will come from. Here's how each strategy works:

  • RANDOM: Each bucket has an equal chance of being picked for each round.
  • EQUAL: Picks are evenly distributed across all buckets (one per bucket when rounds match bucket count).
  • LEAN_HIGH: Higher probability of picking games from buckets with more reviews.
  • LEAN_LOW: Higher probability of picking games from buckets with fewer reviews.
  • LEAN_CENTER: Higher probability of picking games from the middle bucket.
  • HIGH: Multiple picks are reserved from the top two buckets (high review counts).
  • LOW: Multiple picks are reserved from the bottom two buckets (low review counts).
  • CENTER: Multiple picks are reserved from the center bucket.

The strategy chosen each day is hidden, so you'll need to adapt your guessing strategy based on the games you see!
footer: Tip: Pay attention to the review counts of games each day to infer which strategy might be active.

title: Why Sign In?
text:
Signing in unlocks a few benefits:

  • Leaderboard tracking: see your rank on daily, weekly and all-time boards.
  • Fair play: everyone can submit only one guess per round, helping prevent cheating.
  • Feedback & popularity: your participation helps us gauge interest and improve the game.
footer: Thanks for playing and supporting the project! <3

title: New Bucket Strategies
text:
To prevent users from guessing the last pick with certainty, we have implemented new 'bucket' strategies. The game will choose one strategy randomly each day and pick games accordingly.

  • RANDOM: Uniform chance for each bucket per round.
  • EQUAL: Evenly spread picks across buckets (exactly one per bucket when rounds match buckets).
  • LEAN_HIGH: Higher probability for higher-review buckets.
  • LEAN_LOW: Higher probability for lower-review buckets.
  • LEAN_CENTER: Higher probability for the center bucket.
  • HIGH: Reserves multiple picks from the top two buckets.
  • LOW: Reserves multiple picks from the bottom two buckets.
  • CENTER: Reserves multiple picks from the single center bucket.
footer: The actual strategy chosen will be hidden. We hope you enjoy the new strategies! Please let us know if you have any feedback.
